product_name: Black Diamond Alpine Start Hoody Jacket - Men's
long_description: Built for light and fast alpine fun, the Black Diamond Alpine Start Hoody Jacket is an ultralight, soft-shell windshirt that protects against stiff ridgeline breezes and unexpected precipitation. Lightweight Schoeller(R) stretch-woven shell fabric shields against wind and moisture while still remaining incredibly breathable. NanoSphere(R) technology on the fabric resists water, oil and dirt. Climbing-specific gusseted underarm panels free up overhead reach. Adjustable, helmet-compatible hood, elastic cuffs and drawcord hem help seal in warmth. Highly packable jacket stows inside its zippered chest pocket and features an internal carabiner clip loop for easy racking on your harness. Black Diamond Alpine Start Hoody Jacket for men is as useful on summer alpine rock routes as it is on a midwinter skin track.
short_description: Built for light and fast alpine fun, the Black Diamond Alpine Start Hoody Jacket is an ultralight, soft-shell windshirt that protects against stiff ridgeline breezes and unexpected precipitation.
